page.title: 09POSTMAN'S JOB ON SCORAIG
page.content: ON SCORAIG THE POST IS DELIVERED AND UPLIFTED THREE DAYS A WEEK. THE POSTMAN LEAVES HOME AT 10'CLOCK.HE COLLECTS ALL THE MAIL ON SCORAIG FROM THE SCHOOL AND VARIOUS POST BOXES.HE USES A BOAT WITH OUTBOARD ENGINE TO CROSS THE LOCH.ONCE HE IS AT BADLUARACH HE SORTS OUT ALL THE OUTGOING MAIL AND PUTS IT IN A SACK.HE PUTS IT IN A BIG WOODEN POSTBOX,AND SORTS OUT ALL THE INCOMING MAIL,SEPARATING IT INTO THE DIFFERENT HOUSEHOLDS.HE COMES BACK ACROSS THE LOCH,AND DELIVERS THE MAIL. MEANWHILE THE DUNDONNELL POSTMAN COMES DOWN TO BADLUARACH JETTY TO COLLECT THE OUTGOING MAIL AND LEAVE THE INCOMING.THERE ARE SOME DAYS WHEN IT IS TOO STORMY TO CROSS THE LOCH.
